labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Channel gets moved above hidden one There's now a ghost in your discord moving channels
data.expected_result: Channel shouldn't move above the hidden one.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a channel require a specific role to access, and ensure a moderator has Manage Channels perm - Make sure the moderator does not have the required role to view it so it's hidden from him or her - Have the user long click or slight drag on the channel below the hidden one. - If done correctly, the channel they moved should be above the hidden one now despite them not being able to see it.
